<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the bottom-up list scheduler used by the vectorizer. It is used for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checking the legality of vectorization and for scheduling instructions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such a way that makes vectorization possible, if legal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The legality check is performed by &#96;trySchedule(Instrs)&#96;, which will try to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// schedule the IR until all instructions in &#96;Instrs&#96; can be scheduled together</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// back-to-back. If this fails then it is illegal to vectorize &#96;Instrs&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Internally the scheduler uses the vectorizer-specific DependencyGraph class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;VECTORIZE&#95;SANDBOXVECTORIZER&#95;SCHEDULER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;VECTORIZE&#95;SANDBOXVECTORIZER&#95;SCHEDULER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The list scheduler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">Scheduler &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is a list-scheduler and this is the list containing the instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that are ready, meaning that all their dependency successors have already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// been scheduled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/readylistcontainer">ReadyListContainer</a> ReadyList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The dependency graph is used by the scheduler to determine the legal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ordering of instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> DAG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is the top of the schedule, i.e. the location where the scheduler</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is about to place the scheduled instructions. It gets updated as we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;BasicBlock::iterator&gt; ScheduleTopItOpt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This is wasting memory in exchange for fast removal using a raw ptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SchedBundle &#42;, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SchedBundle&gt;</a>&gt; Bndls;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The BB that we are currently scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a60f87746e4945fda7ea3d5a983c9b62c">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ScheduledBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns a scheduling bundle containing \\p Instrs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &#42;createBundle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> eraseBundle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &#42;SB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Schedule nodes until we can schedule \\p Instrs back-to-back.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tryScheduleUntil(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Schedules all nodes in \\p Bndl, marks them as scheduled, updates the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// UnscheduledSuccs counter of all dependency predecessors, and adds any of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// them that become ready to the ready list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> scheduleAndUpdateReadyList(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &amp;Bndl);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The scheduling state of the instructions in the bundle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BndlSchedState &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NoneScheduled, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&gt; No instruction in the bundle was previously scheduled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PartiallyOrDifferentlyScheduled, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&gt; Only some of the instrs in the bundle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                     /// were previously scheduled, or all of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                     /// them were but not in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                     /// SchedBundle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FullyScheduled, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&gt; All instrs in the bundle were previously scheduled and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                    /// were in the same SchedBundle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns whether none/some/all of \\p Instrs have been scheduled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BndlSchedState getBndlSchedState(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Destroy the top-most part of the schedule that includes \\p Instrs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> trimSchedule(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Disable copies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinescheduler-cpp/#a1c735bd46fe1e1b5f6f85a710d99e149">Scheduler</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scheduler &amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Scheduler &amp;operator=(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scheduler &amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#afc7ba921cb118ef7f7a8b0fac4188350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#afc7ba921cb118ef7f7a8b0fac4188350">Scheduler</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/context">Context</a> &amp;Ctx) : DAG(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>, Ctx) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#ae5196b707393b2021e397b3ccc989151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#ae5196b707393b2021e397b3ccc989151">~Scheduler</a>() &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Tries to build a schedule that includes all of \\p Instrs scheduled at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// same scheduling cycle. This essentially checks that there are no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dependencies among \\p Instrs. This function may involve scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// intermediate instructions or canceling and re-scheduling if needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns true on success, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a9c67d906d22a6018e3ff649bafed6a1a">trySchedule</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Clear the scheduler&#39;s state, including the DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#abf8f36441eb2768093b280ec47ab22fc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#abf8f36441eb2768093b280ec47ab22fc">clear</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Bndls.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: clear view once it lands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DAG.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ReadyList.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScheduleTopItOpt = std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScheduledBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Bndls.empty() &amp;&amp; DAG.empty() &amp;&amp; ReadyList.empty() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !ScheduleTopItOpt &amp;&amp; ScheduledBB == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected empty state!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a6a39dd033ba9a22a413f05b32f498509">dump</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
